modName: Natural and Less Green FXAA settings
summary: \"Natural and Less Green FXAA settings\" gets rid of the greenish atmosphere of skyrim and gives the game a more natural and fresh look.
descriptionHtml:
\"Natural and Less Green FXAA settings\" gets rid of the greenish atmosphere of skyrim and gives the game a more natural and fresh look.
I tried to use a lower saturation than the original FXAA setting and a natural choice of colors in order to mantain the immersion of the game: the best results can be seen indoors and during night.
The latest version has Pre and Post sharpen: the FXAA Anti-Aliasing is deactivated in every version (in my opinion it makes the game look worse) but feel free to toggle it on with the FXAA_Tool if you want: you can also adjust other settings like the sharpen if necessary.

Requirements:
Download FXAA Post Process Injector 2.0 and install it (works with 2.0 only):
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131

Installation:
Drop the injFX_Shaders folder in the main folder of Skyrim and overwrite.

Extra:
Use the pause button in game to to see the difference between FXAA and original.

Changelog:
Version 1.2: improvement to the lights.
Version 1.1: the sky is a bit more blue and the colors are more balanced; added sharpen version.

Credits
This is just a setting I came up with for the FXAA Post Process Injector, I didn\'t create or contributed in the creation of the FXAA Post Process Injector. Look here for all the credits:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131
author: ByakuyaSama
